url.title: Get url
url.help: You can review your input or Publish to go to your new map.

title.label: Title
title.placeholder: Choose a title for the map

path.label: Path
path.placeholder: Write a title to suggest a path or edit

sparql.label: SPARQL query
sparql.placeholder: Insert a SPARQL query from Wikidata
sparql.help: Create a SPARQL query on Wikidata Query Service

minZoom.label: Min Zoom
minZoom.help: Lock minimum and maximum values for the zoom. Default values are good for typical configuration.

zoom.label: Zoom
zoom.help: Select zoom value or auto-adjust zoom accordingly to data.

lat.label: Latitude
lat.help: Specify coordinates in decimal format, or move the map and click on the center button.

maxClusterRadius.label: Max cluster radius
maxClusterRadius.help: The higher the value, the more the nearby coordinates will be grouped into browsable clusters.

confirm.text: Do you want to publish map? Hit Cancel to continue to edit.

style.text: Select a map style to start
style.help: Select a type of map and an icon to be shown on top of pin
